tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE composting_bins (
  bin_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  capacity INT,
  last_emptied TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE bin_locations (
  location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  location_address TEXT NOT NULL,
  location_city VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  location_state VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location_country VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'USA'
);

CREATE TABLE bin_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  bin_id INT REFERENCES composting_bins(bin_id),
  location_id INT REFERENCES bin_locations(location_id),
  collection_date DATE NOT NULL,
  collected_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_bin FOREIGN KEY (bin_id) REFERENCES composting_bins(bin_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_location FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES bin_locations(location_id)
);
